meanings.definition: A book containing recipes and instructions for cooking.
meanings.sent1: I used my cookbook to make a delicious dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: My mom keeps her favorite cookbook in the kitchen for easy access.
meanings.sent3: When I opened the cookbook, a recipe for a magical potion fell out!
meanings.sent4: Her cookbook was a treasure trove of culinary secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The cookbook was like a map leading to a world of flavors and aromas.

meanings.definition: A collection of recipes and cooking techniques.
meanings.sent1: The community cookbook had recipes from all the local families.
meanings.sent2: She inherited her grandmother's cookbook filled with traditional dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cookbook on the shelf whispered tantalizing recipes to the other books.
meanings.sent4: His cookbook was a symphony of flavors waiting to be conducted by skilled hands.
meanings.sent5: The worn cookbook held the secrets of generations passed down through the ages.
